blogPost.excerpt: Preparing for sales meetings is hard and tiresome. 1Page helps you search less, and sell more, by delivering customized one-page summary for every meeting and call, minutes before every meeting!
blogPost.body: Preparing for sales meetings is hard and tiresome. 1Page helps you search less, and sell more, by delivering customized one-page summary for every meeting and call, minutes before every meeting!
blogPost.title: 1Page - 1 Page summary to help you to join every meeting confidently
blogPost.author: Pooran Prasad Rajanna

localize.description: 为销售会议做准备是很辛苦的，也是很累人的。1Page通过在每次会议前几分钟，为每次会议和电话提供定制的单页摘要，帮助您减少搜索，增加销售量。
localize.tagline: 1页总结，助你自信加入每一次会议

localize.description: 爲銷售會議做準備是很辛苦的，也是很累人的。1Page通過在每次會議前幾分鐘，爲每次會議和電話提供定製的單頁摘要，幫助您減少搜索，增加銷售量。
localize.tagline: 1頁總結，助你自信加入每一次會議

previous.excerpt: Campah is the easiest way to tie all your content together. Simply claim a URL, set up your link cards, and share your link! You'll have a live page in a minute.
previous.title: Campah - A space for everything you create

localize.description: Campah是将您的所有内容联系在一起的最简单方法。只需申请一个URL，设置你的链接卡，然后分享你的链接! 您将在一分钟内拥有一个实时页面。
localize.tagline: 为您创造的一切提供一个空间

localize.description: Campah是將您的所有內容聯繫在一起的最簡單方法。只需申請一個URL，設置你的鏈接卡，然後分享你的鏈接! 您將在一分鐘內擁有一個實時頁面。
localize.tagline: 爲您創造的一切提供一個空間
